definition: medium/intermediary/matchmaker/go-between/abbr. for 媒體|媒体[mei2 ti3], media, esp. news media

sentences.english: In fact, vector control is the one and only preventive measure.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，病媒控制是唯一的预防措施。

sentences.english: The spread of other vector-borne diseases could also increase.
sentences.chinese: 其他病媒疾病的传播也可能增加。

sentences.english: All of the important vector species bite at night.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些主要病媒按蚊均在夜间叮咬。

sentences.english: The WHO representative in Pakistan is an expert in vector control.
sentences.chinese: 世卫组织驻巴基斯坦代表是一名病媒控制专家。

sentences.english: Vector control is the most useful method to prevent Chagas disease in Latin America.
sentences.chinese: 在拉丁美洲预防恰加斯病的最有用方法是病媒控制。

sentences.english: This approach is called Integrated vector management (IVM).
sentences.chinese: 这一方法称之为“综合病媒管理”。

sentences.english: Vector control is the most effective method of preventing Chagas disease in Latin America.
sentences.chinese: 在拉丁美洲预防恰加斯病的最有效方法是病媒控制。

sentences.english: IVM also encourages an integrated approach to disease control.
sentences.chinese: 综合病媒管理还鼓励采用综合方法开展疾病控制。

sentences.english: The density of the main medical vectors and positive rate of detection of pathogens were low.
sentences.chinese: 主要病媒生物的密度和病原阳性检出率均较低。

definition: (Tw) to combat (bullying, money laundering etc)/to counter
environmental sanitation/abbr. to 環衛|环卫[huan2 wei4]
fire ant (Solenopsis invicta), an introduced species in China
to prevent and control (e.g. the spread of a communicable disease)
